Title: Robocop
Original title: Robocop
Country: USA
USA release: 12/02/2014
Released in Spain: 02/14/2014
Studio: Metro Goldwyn Mayer, Sony Pictures
Directed by Jose Padilha
Screenplay: Nick Schenk, Joshua Zetumer
Starring: Gary Oldman, Samuel L. Jackson, Joel Kinnaman , Michael Keaton , Jay Baruchel , Abbie Cornish, Jackie Earle Haley, Jennifer Ehle, Michael Kenneth Williams, Marianne Jean- Baptiste , WBBrown II
Rating: Not recommended for children under 12 years

Synopsis:
In RoboCop, 2029 and runs the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp is on the axis of robotic technology . Their planes earn U.S. wars around the world and now seek to bring this technology to the home front. Alex Murphy, husband, father and police are doing their best to stem the tide of crime and corruption in Detroit. After falling seriously injured in the line of duty , OmniCorp uses his extraordinary robotics to save Alex's life . The police now returns to his beloved city with amazing new abilities, but with a few problems that a common man would never have had to face.

Director JosÃƒÂ© Padilha (Elite Squad), the film recreates the story of a man half machine half human . It stars a cop played by Joel Kinnaman (The Killing) as the title character, Gary Oldman (The Dark Knight Rises) as the scientist who creates the robot and Samuel L.Jackson (The Avengers) as the media mogul, Pat Novak.

Production notes:
New version of Paul Verhoeven tape released in 1987, Robocop
